posts.post_content:
People have already mentioned the combo to get this out turn 2 with [Joraga Treespeaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Joraga Treespeaker). How about these:  
  
T1: [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves)  
T2: [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra), Terramorphic Expanse, this.  
  
T1: [Birds of Paradise](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birds of Paradise)  
T2: [Nest Invader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nest Invader) or [Brood Birthing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brood Birthing) or [Spawning Breath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spawning Breath), sacrifice the token and tap the Birds for this.  
  
T1: [Birds of Paradise](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birds of Paradise)  
T2: [Grand Architect](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grand Architect), tap him immediately for this.  
  
T1: [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves)  
T2: Tap Elves for mana, [Veteran's Reflexes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Veteran's Reflexes) or [Vault Skyward](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vault Skyward) to get another mana from the Elves. Play [My Superion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=My Superion)  
  
All of these combos are legal in standard. Outside of standard, my favourite method to cast this guy is with [Manaforge Cinder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Manaforge Cinder).  
  
5/5 stars.
posts.html:
People have already mentioned the combo to get this out turn 2 with Joraga Treespeaker. How about these:

T1: Llanowar Elves
T2: Lotus Cobra, Terramorphic Expanse, this.

T1: Birds of Paradise
T2: Nest Invader or Brood Birthing or Spawning Breath, sacrifice the token and tap the Birds for this.

T1: Birds of Paradise
T2: Grand Architect, tap him immediately for this.

T1: Llanowar Elves
T2: Tap Elves for mana, Veteran's Reflexes or Vault Skyward to get another mana from the Elves. Play My Superion

All of these combos are legal in standard. Outside of standard, my favourite method to cast this guy is with Manaforge Cinder.

5/5 stars.

If you can get this to cost 0 mana (say with a [Semblance Anvil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Semblance Anvil)) can you play it without using a creature since you don't have to actually pay any mana? Also, how about using this with a [Prototype Portal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Prototype Portal)...pretty sweet to pump one of these out for 2 mana every turn.

posts.post_content:
This is perfect in a man-lands deck running Mishra's Factory, Mutavault, four of each Nexus, etc. You can activate the man-lands and then tap them for mana for Superion, and you can rescue Superion from the graveyard with [Buried Ruin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Buried Ruin). Maybe 4x Myr Superion, 4x [Juggernaut](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Juggernaut), 4x [Lodestone Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lodestone Golem), and whatever else is needed to round out the deck (AnTzero's idea of Dryad Arbor seems great, maybe throw in four [Crucible of Worlds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crucible of Worlds)?)  
  
...Also, those Eldrazi spawn tokens are salivating all over this card.  
  
...Also too: I predict this will be [Birthing Pod](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birthing Pod)'s top choice for a 2cc search.
posts.html:
This is perfect in a man-lands deck running Mishra's Factory, Mutavault, four of each Nexus, etc. You can activate the man-lands and then tap them for mana for Superion, and you can rescue Superion from the graveyard with Buried Ruin. Maybe 4x Myr Superion, 4x Juggernaut, 4x Lodestone Golem, and whatever else is needed to round out the deck (AnTzero's idea of Dryad Arbor seems great, maybe throw in four Crucible of Worlds?)

...Also, those Eldrazi spawn tokens are salivating all over this card.

...Also too: I predict this will be Birthing Pod's top choice for a 2cc search.
